NewsHeading: Contact Lost with Sriwijaya Air Boeing 737-500 Afetr Take Off
Detail:
Sriwijaya Air flight SJ182 was a domestic flight from Jakarta Soekarnoâ€“Hatta International Airport (CGK) to Pontianak Supadio International Airport (PNK). It was operated by a 26-year old Boeing 737-500 registered PK-CLC. This aircraft has been with the airline since 2012, having previously flown for US carriers Continental and United. {'


'}Data from tracking website FlightRadar24.com suggests that it had reached almost 11,000 feet on its climb northwards over the Java Sea, before losing almost all of this height within a minute. Radar contact was lost at 07:40 UTC, or 14:40 local time, when the aircraft was at an altitude of just 250 feet.
